verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He lives, the great Redeemer lives, What joy the blest assurance gives! And now, before His Father, God, Pleads the full merits of His blood.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In every dark, distressful hour, When sin and Satan join their power, Let this dear hope repel the dart, That Jesus bears us on His heart.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
